forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 49. West wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 10am. Mostly sunny. High near 55, with temperatures falling to around 52 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 14 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens under a blanket of clouds, promising a mix of damp and fleeting sunshine through the day. The overnight rain has faded, leaving behind a freshness in the air heightened by a cool breeze. The temperature hovers in the low forties, beckoning the residents to bundle up in cozy layers, perhaps donning a light jacket over a wool sweater to counter the chill from the west winds reaching up to 18 mph. The elusive fog may tease the horizon, but it's more a matter of misty whispers than drenching shrouds; visibility appears relatively clear, with the vibrant cityscape emerging through the morning haze.

As the sun climbs towards midday, the likelihood of rain dwindles to a whisper, with a slight chance still hanging before ten. Eventually, the clouds may part to reveal short bursts of warm sunshine, lifting spirits and inviting a leisurely stroll through the streets or a quiet moment in one of the local parks. With highs around 55, the warmth will settle into the late afternoon, providing a perfect backdrop to sip a cup of coffee in a sun-drenched café while enjoying the backdrop of this iconic city. Whether navigating the bustling financial district or exploring the quieter avenues, today’s palette promises a mix of brisk energy and muted charm—ideal for those wishing to bask in the San Francisco ambiance with a sense of serenity.
